metadata.name: SÃ„X
metadata.description:
This collaboration started in July 2021.  
  
Long before creating the Nifty Sax Spheres I was experimenting with my saxophone sound.  
  
I always liked to envelop myself in a warm shower of musical vibrations.  
I find it comforting and almost spiritual.  
  
This music was a prototype for what became the 'Nifty Sax Spheres'.  
  
I found Komachi's art in June and I was hypnotized.
I wanted to create something for her so I recorded this little piece of music.  
  
There was a lot of back and forth and our work evolved over time.  

This is the result of a friendship between two artists.  
  
---
  
  
NiftySax x Komachi
